# **Tender Announcement: Fire Systems Upgrade at Centre for Atmospheric Research Experiments (CARE) Building**

## **Request for Proposal (RFP)**

The Government of Canada, represented by Environment Canada, is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the upgrade of the fire protection systems at the Centre for Atmospheric Research Experiments (CARE) building in Egbert, Ontario.

### **Background**

The existing fire protection systems, originally installed when the building was constructed, are nearing the end of their life cycle and require repairs and renewal.

### **Location and Description**

The project involves the upgrade of the fire protection systems at the CARE building, located at 6248 8th Line, Egbert, ON L0L 1N0. The services required include:

* Investigation of the existing fire pond and coordination with the municipality
* Design and installation of new fire alarm systems
* Replacement of emergency lighting
* Associated fire stopping
* Integrity of exits
* Door hardware upgrade to meet exit requirements
* Preparation of a complete tender package

### **Contact Information and Requirements**

* **Contract Manager**: James Molinski, james.molinski@ec.gc.ca
* **Tender Documents and Information**: Available for download at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/30/fb1a5f885438d5031557142abb8715e7/5000067373_en.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/19/04f1398779b1d8bcf385af86405b312d/solicitation_5000067373_amendment_1.pdf
* **Submission Deadline**: 2023-04-28T14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time

The RFP deadline has expired, therefore the tender is closed. Environment Canada is not accepting any further submissions.

The successful contractor will be selected based on their qualifications, experience, and ability to meet the requirements outlined in the RFP. The project is expected to be carried out in accordance with the notice of Standing Offer sections VII.0 and VII.1.
